title: The last lover / L'ultimo amante (1955 Italy) Drama, Romance | Colorized Full Movie

sources.title: The last lover / L'ultimo amante (1955 Italy) Drama, Romance | Colorized Full Movie
sources.description:
Maria, a prostitute, meets Cesare in a police station, a drunkard reporter. Cesare falls in love with her and wants to save her from her bleak life but the girl refuses any help.

Original title: L'ultimo amante (1955)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/VT1GVdSnOos

Subtitles available for this movie

Director: Mario Mattoli
Writers: Augusto Camerini, Aldo De Benedetti, Luciano Mattoli
Stars: Amedeo Nazzari, May Britt, Nino Besozzi
Genres: Italian cinema, Colorized, Drama, Romance
